document_data.mainbody: Web of Chaos is a  free adventure pack for Dungeons & Dragons Online where the player characters face strange drow cultists in Stormreach, only to discover Lolth and her plots for both Eberron and Faer√ªn. The adventure pack was added to the game on February 27, 2012 as part of Update 16, and served as an introduction to Dungeons & Dragons Online Menace of the Underdark and further Forgotten Realms content.
